flawed_nl_solution:
Three years ago, his sons were 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13 years old.
Three years ago, Beau was 13 + 13 + 13 = <<13+13+13=39>>39 years old.
Today, Beau is 39 + 3 = <<39+3=24>>24 years old.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 24. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
